data.title: Music Venue
data.text: Beautiful Restored Venue in Downtown Homestead! Every seat is a Great One! Try one of the local restaurants across the street and make an evening in Downtown Homestead. Ticket prices are very reasonable!

data.title: Fabulous theatre venue in Homestead!
data.text: Since the recent opening of the theater, I have seen Jon Secada, non stop two hours of intense entertainment with music and comedy, Paul Thorn, singer, guitarist, humorist from my home state of Mississippi, Chamber Orchestra of South Beach, and others.  When in this area, make sure you check it out.  You won't be sorry!

owner_response.author: Mickey M, Manager at Seminole Theatre, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for attending and writing a review!  We hope you'll consider becoming a member next year.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nicole Henry concert
data.text: Recently restored, the Seminole theater is the performance venue homestead has lacked for a very long time. Intimate and freshly new there's not a bad seat in the house. Staff is very professional and kudos to management for providing a range of performances that have a broad appeal. Local talent is also showcased as well, sometimes as the opening act for a national talent. The Nicole Henry performance brought the house down. Tall, sassy and very hip she is a powerhouse. With her expert backing band she blew the roof off. Bravo Bravo Bravo!

owner_response.author: Mickey M, Manager at Seminole Theatre, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review and we hope to see you back soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Charlie Musselwhite
data.text:
Charlie was great, however the production company the Seminole Theatre has contracted to do the sound is an absolute embarrassment. 2 failed vocal mics (Charlie's) during the performance, a stage hand stumbling over a world class lead guitarist to to rig a soon failed wired mic (Charlie's), only to have Charlie Musselwhite resort to his Harmonica mic for his vocals for the back 1/2 of the show. What a joke and embarrassment for an honorable blues legend. You guys should be ashamed! 
Did I mention the stage monitors also went out in the back 1/2 of the show??
Spend the money and finish the job you started when you finally renovated this historic Theater....sound is critical in the performing arts....I won't be back until I read an announcement from the venue about an upgraded sound system.

owner_response.author: Mickey M, Manager at Seminole Theatre, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Todd,
Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback.  It was very unfortunate that the sound system hit a snag at the end of that concert.  As you know, that's one of the pitfalls of live performances, but also what can make them exciting and memorable.  We're lucky that Charlie Musselwhite is such a pro and could keep it rocking.  
Fortunately the issues you mentioned are all related to just one problem that was immediately addressed and the sound system is working perfectly.  In addition, we're happy to report we  have been awarded a grant to significantly upgrade the sound system along with several other aspects of the live performance and building experience.  We thank you for your  patronage, and hope you will be back soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Exellent experience
data.text: This is a wonderful theater.  Had an excellent time here.  We saw Jon Secda here.  He put on and excellent show.   Love having it in our city.

data.title: Local na cidade Histórica
data.text: Meu hotel era muito próximo do teatro e o mesmo está localizado na parte histórica da cidade. É um ótimo lugar para visitar mesmo que você não entre no mesmo!

data.title: Este sitio a reabierto sus puertas recientemente, despues de un largo rato. Es un lugar 100 por ciento recomendable.
data.text: Este sitio ha reabierto sus puertas recientemente, despues de un largo rato. Es un lugar 100 por ciento recomendable. En una ciudad tan desprovista de atractivos culturales, esta parece ser una opcion apreciable.

owner_response.author: Mickey M, Manager at Seminole Theatre, responded to this review
owner_response.title: Owner Response
